blogs_.post_saving_error: An error occurred during post saving
blogs_.post_deleting_error: An error occurred during post deleting
blogs_.select_sections_num: You can select up to %s sections
blogs_.post_use_pagebreak: Use <!-- pagebreak --&gt to separate preface and rest of text, in order to show preface in the list of posts, instead of automatic truncating of content. Very long preface will be truncated automatically.
blogs_.post_adding_error: An error occurred during post adding
blogs_.section_path_info: This option allow to specify path, that will be in URL for this section (if empty - will be filled automatically)
blogs_.sure_to_delete_post: Are you sure want to delete post %s?
blogs_.sure_to_delete_posts_section: Are you sure want to delete posts section %s?
blogs_.posts_per_page_info: Number of posts, which will be displayed on one page
blogs_.max_sections: Maximum number of sections for post
blogs_.max_sections_info: Every post can be associated with several sections. This parameter specifies the maximum number of such sections.
blogs_.enable_comments_info: Allows to enable or disable posts comments, depends on Comments module
blogs_.new_posts_only_from_admins_info: Only administrators are able to write new posts. Otherwise any registered user can write new post.
blogs_.allow_iframes_without_content_info: For example, allows to insert video from youtube
blogs_.sure_want_to_exit: Are you sure want to exit this page? All changes will be lost!
